title: Shader Tools
description: A versatile pack of custom shader effects. Perfect for enhancing your game's visual effects with customizable and efficient shaders. Ideal for both beginners and advanced users.
longDescription:
Shader Tools is a powerful and versatile pack of fully customizable HLSL shaders designed to elevate your game's visual effects. This comprehensive collection provides a wide range of shaders categorized into Animated, Effects, and Masks, catering to both beginners and advanced users seeking to create stunning visuals with maximum flexibility.


***Assets are generated using ComfyUI and Code Pilot GPT***


Key Features:

  • Fully Customizable HLSL Code: Each shader in Shader Tools is built with fully customizable HLSL code, allowing developers to tweak and modify the effects to meet their specific needs. The code is well-documented and structured, making it easy to understand and adapt.
  • Wide Range of Shaders: The pack includes a diverse selection of shaders to cover various visual needs:
  • Animated Shaders: Create dynamic, eye-catching animations with shaders like pulsating zooms, wave distortions, galaxy simulations, and more. Examples include MF_BasicFractalHLSL, MF_BeamHLSL, and MF_SpiralingHLSL.
  • Effect Shaders: Enhance the visual quality of your game with advanced effects such as chromatic aberrations, fisheye distortions, edge detection, and radial blur. Examples include MF_ChromaticAberrationHLSL, MF_FishEyeHLSL, and MF_RadialBlurHLSL.
  • Mask Shaders: Implement precise and dynamic masks with various shapes, perfect for UI elements or special effects. Examples include MF_CircleMaskHLSL, MF_SquareMaskHLSL, and MF_TriangleMaskHLSL.
  • High Performance: All shaders are optimized for fast FPS, ensuring high-quality generative effects without compromising performance. This makes Shader Tools suitable for both high-end and low-end hardware, maintaining smooth gameplay and visual fidelity.
  • Dynamic Masks: Create real-time, dynamic masks that can be customized and animated, providing flexibility for various applications such as UI design, special effects, and transitions.
  • Cinematic Integration: Easily integrate shader parameters into Unreal Engine's cinematic sequences. Animate shader properties over time to create dynamic and engaging scenes that react to gameplay or narrative events.
  • Material Functions: Shader Tools includes a variety of material functions designed for easy integration into existing materials. These functions allow for complex layering and mixing of effects, enabling developers to create unique visual styles and enhancements.
  • Modular and Mixable: The shaders are designed to be modular, allowing developers to mix and match effects to create endless combinations. This modularity provides creative freedom and flexibility, enabling the creation of unique and captivating visual experiences.

Code Focus:

  • Detailed Documentation: Each shader comes with comprehensive documentation, explaining the purpose and functionality of each code segment. This documentation helps developers understand how the shaders work and how to customize them effectively.
  • Structured Code: The HLSL code is organized and structured for readability and maintainability. This makes it easier for developers to dive into the code, make adjustments, and extend the shaders' functionality.
  • Custom Material Nodes: Shader Tools utilizes custom material nodes, allowing for complex HLSL logic to be encapsulated within easy-to-use nodes. These nodes can be connected and configured within the material editor, providing a visual approach to shader development.
  • Performance Optimization: The shaders are optimized to run efficiently, leveraging the power of HLSL and Unreal Engine's rendering pipeline. This ensures that even complex effects can be rendered in real-time without a significant impact on performance.
  • Examples and Use Cases: The pack includes example materials and scenes showcasing how to use the shaders effectively. These examples serve as a starting point for developers, demonstrating various use cases and providing inspiration for creating custom effects.

Why Choose Shader Tools?

Shader Tools offers a robust and flexible solution for creating high-quality visual effects. With its fully customizable HLSL code, performance optimization, and easy integration into Unreal Engine's material system, this pack is perfect for game developers, VFX artists, and designers looking to push the boundaries of visual effects. Whether you're enhancing gameplay visuals, creating stunning cinematics, or designing dynamic UI elements, Shader Tools equips you with the necessary tools to bring your vision to life.

technicalDetails:
Key Features:

  • Fully Customizable HLSL Code: Each shader is built with HLSL code that is fully customizable, allowing developers to tweak and modify effects to meet specific requirements.
  • High Performance: Shaders are optimized for fast FPS, ensuring smooth gameplay and high-quality generative effects without compromising performance.
  • Material Functions: Includes a variety of material functions for easy integration into existing materials, enabling complex and layered visual effects.
  • Cinematic Integration: Shader parameters can be animated and adjusted in Unreal Engine's cinematic sequences, providing dynamic, real-time adjustments.
  • Modular and Mixable: Shaders are designed to be modular, allowing for mixing and matching of effects to create endless combinations and unique visuals.
  • Well-Documented: Each shader comes with comprehensive documentation, explaining the purpose and functionality of each code segment for easy understanding and customization.


***Assets are generated using ComfyUI and Code Pilot GPT***

Number of Unique Materials and Material Instances: 72 Materials, 92 Material instances, 69 Material Functions

Number of Textures: 17 Textures

Texture Resolutions: 576x576, 1463x826, 2048x2048, 1024x1024, 1280x1280

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Documentation: Animated Shaders - Effect Shaders - Mask Shaders
